Class IOConfigX

java.lang.Object
  com.nxp.id.jcopx.IOConfigX

public final class IOConfigX
extends java.lang.Object

Class to configure the IO resources from a Java Card applet

Method Detail

enableInterface

public static void enableInterface(byte ifId)
                            throws IOConfigException
Enable the given interface.

Parameters:
ifId - of the interface
Throws:
IOConfigException - with reason codes
  • IOConfigException.IF_INVALID in case an invalid ifId has been given.
  • IOConfigException.IF_ENABLED_DISABLED_FAILED in case the given ifId can't be enabled.

disableInterface

public static void disableInterface(byte ifId)
                             throws IOConfigException
Disable the given interface.

Parameters:
ifId - of the interface
Throws:
IOConfigException - with reason codes
  • IOConfigException.IF_INVALID in case an invalid ifId has been given.
  • IOConfigException.IF_ENABLED_DISABLED_FAILED in case the given ifId can't be disabled.

setIOConfig

public static void setIOConfig(byte configId,
                               byte[] configVal,
                               short offset,
                               short len)
                        throws IOConfigException
Sets a new configuration.

Parameters:
configId - identifies the configuration item
configVal - byte array incorporating the value to be configured
offset - offset of the value within the array
len - length of the array elements presenting the value to be configured
Throws:
IOConfigException - with reason codes
  • IOConfigException.CONFIG_ID_INVALID in case an configId ifId has been given.
  • IOConfigException.CONFIG_VALUE_INVALID in case the given configVal is invalid.
  • IOConfigException.ARRAY_REFERENCE_INVALID in case one of the array parameters is invalid.

getIOConfig

public static short getIOConfig(byte configId,
                                byte[] configVal,
                                short offset)
                         throws IOConfigException
Gets a configuration.

Parameters:
configId - identifies the configuration item
configVal - byte array into which the current value shall be inserted
offset - offset of the value within the array
Returns:
length of the current value stored in configVal starting at offset
Throws:
IOConfigException - with reason codes
  • IOConfigException.CONFIG_ID_INVALID in case an configId ifId has been given.
  • IOConfigException.ARRAY_REFERENCE_INVALID in case one of the array parameters is invalid.
